name: Hyper Treasure - The Legend of Macaron Demo
name_original: Hyper Treasure - The Legend of Macaron Demo
description:
Noracam has come to ruin, where the legendary treasure, "Macaron" is said to be hidden. Without knowing it was the most dangerous place that can experience ...

In this demo, you can play up to a certain point in the game

・ Some mysteries are different from the full version
・ The save data is not shared with the full version
・ Achievements cannot be earned

Solve mysteries, with simple mouse operations

There are several QTEs against fierce monsters
